content: the flora headband features two types of cables the pattern is a 16-row repeat the headband is knitted flat and the shorter edges are sewn together forming a twist and hiding the seam the i-cord edge makes the headband look neat and prevents it from curling this headband is knitted with light weight yarn size to fit women s medium 54-56 cm/ 21 3/4 22″ if you are knitting for a smaller/bigger circumference just knit fewer/ more row finished measurements - width 10 5 cm 4 15″ wide - circumference 50cm 19 75″
